        @RequestMapping(value="/newuser",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String newuser(@ModelAttribute(value="NewUser")
                                      NewUser newUser,
                                      org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                      java.util.Locale locale,
                                      org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Uses SpringSecurity objects/models
        Parameters:
        newUser - The newUser object as defined by SpringSecurity
        result - Post data from what has been submitted
        locale - Information about the session and location of the user
        model - The model that gets passed to the JSP files
        Returns:
        The JSP file name
